title: 玲珑杯 R7 C-Duplicate Numbers
content:
problem:1073 用map维护.

#include

#include

#include

#include
using namespace std;
int main(){
ios::sync_with_stdio(false);
int N;
cin>>N;
while(N–){
int M,flag=0;
cin>>M;
map<int,int> ma;
for(int i=0;i<M;++i){
int n;
cin>>n;
ma[n]++;
if(flag==0 && ma[n]>1) flag=1;
}
if(flag){
map<int,int>::iterator it;
for(it=ma.begin();it->second<=1;it++){}
cout<first;
it++;
for(;it!=ma.end();it++)
if(it->second>1)
cout<<” “<first;
cout<<endl;
}else{
cout<<”none”<<endl;
}
}

return 0;

}
